description: Students study the role of music in worship with an emphasis on strategies for developing music groups, including handbells and Orff instruments, in worship and church education. Offered fall semester 2016-17 and alternate years. Prerequisite: MUSIC 214 or permission of instructor.
name: Church Music Pract I
prerequisites: Prerequisite: MUSIC 214 or permission of instructor.
title: Church Music Practicum I
